title: League keeps crashing
body: So when I go into a game the champ select is all fine but when I load in I crash and when I try to reconnect I get an error message saying check my internet, its been disconnected and I know it hasn't because I am usually in a discord with my friends. When it finally starts letting me connect it takes forever to go to 100% I spent about 5 min once just waiting to go from 0 to 1%. Its not my ping I have a solid 63 ping every game but I don't know why its happening and I keep losing lp in ranked and getting leaver busters because of it. Anyone know how to fix?

replies.body: league of legends crashing and frezzing

Even if your internet works fine using other services, you can still have issues reaching specific servers like the game server.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is causing your network to not reach us.  Let me know if you have any questions!
